title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. VII, pt. 209 - Contract Oversight
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. VII, pt. 209 - Contract Oversight

State Regulations
§ 209.1 - Approval and filing
§ 209.2 - Form of certain contracts
§ 209.3 - Compliance with contracts
§ 209.4 - Duration of management contracts
§ 209.5 - Voiding management contracts
§ 209.6 - Assignments of management contracts
§ 209.7 - Services after contract term
§ 209.8 - Provisions in management contracts
§ 209.9 - Manager to be combatant's exclusive representative
§ 209.10 - Boxer-promoter contracts-mandatory provisions
§ 209.11 - Compensation of professional boxers and mixed martial artists
§ 209.12 - Ring earnings of combatants
§ 209.13 - How payment for services must be made
§ 209.14 - "Low-blow" clause mandatory in professional boxing
§ 209.15 - Broadcast or telecast of bout
§ 209.16 - Promotional contracts

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. VII, pt. 209

Statutory authority: Unconsolidated Laws, § 8901; L. 1996, ch. 708

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
